answers.answer: Well ur due date is only an estament so u could be further along or ur baby is just bigger
Its totally normal for you to measure 1-3 weeks early in your pregnancy,  you shouldnt be worried at all.

Ive been measuring large too - have you had your diabetes test done yet? Sometimes if you have GD it can cauSe big bubbies. My Bub is alMost 2 weeks ahead of herself so they are sending me for my 34wk growth scan next week - she is currently measuring 35wks already, last app 2 weeks ago she was only 1wk ahead of herself so she's getting bigger :-/ Ill find out if they'll induce Me after that so I'm sure once you are a bit further along they will re-check the growth so don't worry too much till then

I was measuring 2 weeks ahead and i found out at 36 weeks that im gestational diabetic. My test at 24weeks was normal. They said that i was measuring large because she's in the 90% for her age and i have extra amniotic fluid.

question: Im 25 weeks and doctor told me my baby was measuring out 27 wedks is that normal
title: normal
